title: Skin idea for Tahm Kench (Koolaid Man)

replies.body:
OH YEAHHHH!!!!

Now I can't stop laughing, thanks for the awesome idea @Cybinary!
Sooo, maybe we'll see it in the future? Or is it a copyright issue that will make it a no go?

I'd like to see Sion with this too. His ultimate would turn into juice and when it crashes into someone, an animation of walls breaking appears instead of his traditional red splash. His global sound would also be changed to make it even bettar!
